thread.title: Risk on Supports USD/JPY, but Syria Situation Weighs
thread.title_full: Risk on Supports USD/JPY, but Syria Situation Weighs - WSJ

author: Hiroyuki Kachi
title: Risk on Supports USD/JPY, but Syria Situation Weighs
text: 0034 GMT [Dow Jones] The USD/JPY, now at 119.91, remains top heavy around 120.10, but a recovery in risk sentiment--causing gains in stocks, emerging nations currencies and resources prices--”is creating environment supportive to the pair’s uptick,” says Osamu Takashima, chief FX strategist at Citigruop Global Markets Japan, in a morning note. But unless the pair’s rebound to 120.70 and 121.00, there still remains downside risk to bring the pair down to 117.20. Takashima says the situation in Syria, especially Russia’s involvement, remains as a source of concern. In the latest development, Russian cruise missiles...
